message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your initial offer, but $14,000 is closer to the true value of this product. To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $8,000 represents a fair price for this product. I hope you can consider this amount as my final offer.
